input_text: lu factuality: The late Bin Baz was the grand Muslim scholar in Saudi Arabia.

input_text: lu factuality: Al-Maqdasi, a Jordanian militant, is sympathetic to Al-Qaida.
target_text: Al-Maqdasi, a Jordanian militant, [is|true] sympathetic to Al-Qaida.

input_text: lu factuality: He was acquitted in Jordan of charges that he had ties to Al-Qaida.
target_text: He was [acquitted|true] in Jordan of charges that he [had|true] ties to Al-Qaida.

input_text: lu factuality: In a recent interview with Al-Jazeera he spoke against the Arab regimes.
target_text: In a recent interview with Al-Jazeera he [spoke|true] against the Arab regimes.

input_text: lu factuality: Immediately after the interview, he was apprehended again by the Jordanian authority.
target_text: Immediately after the interview, he was [apprehended|true] again by the Jordanian authority.

input_text: lu factuality: Sheik Rida, fear God.
target_text: Sheik Rida, [fear|true] God.

input_text: lu factuality: You are not fair when you belittle Sheik Bin Baz's blunder and exaggerate the one by Sheik Maqdasi...
target_text: You [are|true] not fair when you [belittle|true] Sheik Bin Baz's [blunder|true] and [exaggerate|true] the one by Sheik Maqdasi...

input_text: lu factuality: Sheik Maqdasi did not criticize Sheik Bin Baz's only for his edict which emphasizes not to consider a regime an apostate if it hasn't adhered to Islamic laws.
target_text: Sheik Maqdasi did not [criticize|true] Sheik Bin Baz's only for his [edict|true] which [emphasizes|true] not to [consider|true] a regime an apostate if it hasn't [adhered|true] to Islamic laws.

input_text: lu factuality: Well, this is not the case.
target_text: Well, this [is|true] not the case.

input_text: lu factuality: If, you study the evidences and statements released by these people, we tend to appreciate their ignorance which was based on prominent views.
target_text: If, you [study|true] the [evidences|true] and [statements|true] released by these people, we [tend|true] to [appreciate|false] their ignorance which was [based|true] on prominent [views|true].

input_text: lu factuality: We had done that before with others who were known for their serious blunders.
target_text: We had [done|true] that before with others who were [known|true] for their serious [blunders|true].

input_text: lu factuality: I'm not going to illustrate these evidences and statements; God is my witness, I don't want to deceive anyone.
target_text: I'm not going to [illustrate|true] these evidences and statements; God [is|unknown] my witness, I don't [want|true] to [deceive|unknown] anyone.

input_text: lu factuality: However, I will mention one of these evidences reiterated by them.
target_text: However, I will [mention|true] one of these evidences [reiterated|true] by them.

input_text: lu factuality: Indeed, the Sheik issued two edicts regarding the same issue that contradict each other...
target_text: Indeed, the Sheik [issued|true] two [edicts|true] regarding the same [issue|true] that [contradict|true] each other...

input_text: lu factuality: First, he forbade seeking the aid of infidels when the Syrian Mujahiddin asked Saddam Hussein to overthrow the regime of Hafiz Al-Assad in Syria.
target_text: First, he [forbade|true] [seeking|unknown] the [aid|true] of infidels when the Syrian Mujahiddin [asked|true] Saddam Hussein to [overthrow|true] the regime of Hafiz Al-Assad in Syria.

input_text: lu factuality: However, he allowed the Gulf regimes to depend on the infidels in attacking Saddam Hussein.
target_text: However, he [allowed|true] the Gulf regimes to [depend|true] on the infidels in [attacking|true] Saddam Hussein.

input_text: lu factuality: [He issued] more edicts to accommodate the policies of the Saudi regime.
target_text: [He [issued|true]] more [edicts|true] to [accommodate|unknown] the policies of the Saudi regime.

input_text: lu factuality: This behavior and not the edict itself forced them to be deceptive.
target_text: This [behavior|true] and not the [edict|true] itself [forced|true] them to [be|true] deceptive.

input_text: lu factuality: I am sure that you are aware of all these suspicions that surround the regime's [Religious] scholars.
target_text: I [am|true] sure that you [are|true] aware of all these [suspicions|true] that [surround|true] the regime's [Religious] scholars.

input_text: lu factuality: So, try to appreciate the Muslims' position, especially if these suspicions are credible.
target_text: So, [try|true] to [appreciate|unknown] the Muslims' [position|true], especially if these suspicions [are|true] credible.

input_text: lu factuality: Brother Rida, I plead to you through this article to understand the views of others, just like we try to understand the views of those who went astray.
target_text: Brother Rida, I [plead|true] to you through this article to [understand|true] the [views|true] of others, just like we [try|true] to [understand|unknown] the [views|true] of those who [went|true] astray.

target_text: How [is|unknown] Turkey?

target_text: I [hope|true] you are [enjoying|unknown] your stay there.

target_text: I [wrote|true] a letter to Ayman.

input_text: lu factuality: Please print it on a thin paper; may God reward you.
target_text: Please [print|true] it on a thin paper; may God [reward|unknown] you.

input_text: lu factuality: Please read this message if you have the time.
target_text: Please [read|true] this message if you have the time.

input_text: lu factuality: I am open for any suggestions.
target_text: I [am|true] open for any [suggestions|false].

input_text: lu factuality: I hope I can communicate with you through the Messenger before you depart Turkey.
target_text: I [hope|true] I can [communicate|unknown] with you through the Messenger before you [depart|true] Turkey.

target_text: [Send|true] my [regards|true] to my aunt, uncle and grandmother.

target_text: [Take|true] back the stuff which Ayman [asked|true] you to [carry|true] to Saudi Arabia.

input_text: lu factuality: I apologize for any inconvenience.

target_text: U.S. Democratic Party Congressman Tony Hall [left|true] here Thursday after [concluding|true] his landmark [visit|true] to Iraq, which has [been|true] under sweeping U.N. [sanctions|true] since 1990.

input_text: lu factuality: In a statement, Hall expressed regret over the negative impacts of the decade-old sanctions on Iraqi people.

input_text: lu factuality: During his four-day stay, Hall visited hospitals and health institutions in Baghdad and the southern Muthana Province.
target_text: During his four-day stay, Hall [visited|true] hospitals and health institutions in Baghdad and the southern Muthana Province.

input_text: lu factuality: The U.S. lawmaker got acquainted with the sufferings of the Iraqi children because of acute shortage of food and medicine as a direct result of the embargo, reported the Iraqi News Agency (INA).

input_text: lu factuality: He also witnessed cases of malnutrition and poliomyelitis that have doubled since 1990, when U.N. imposed the sanctions against Iraq for its invasion of Kuwait, said the INA.
target_text: He also [witnessed|false] cases of [malnutrition|false] and [poliomyelitis|false] that have [doubled|false] since 1990, when U.N. [imposed|true] the [sanctions|true] against Iraq for its [invasion|true] of Kuwait, [said|true] the INA.

input_text: lu factuality: Hall said on Monday that he regretted the miserable humanitarian situation in Iraq while visiting a hospital in the Mansour district of the Iraqi capital.
target_text: Hall [said|true] on Monday that he [regretted|false] the miserable humanitarian [situation|false] in Iraq while [visiting|true] a hospital in the Mansour district of the Iraqi capital.

input_text: lu factuality: Hall's landmark visit to Iraq started on Sunday evening when he arrived here by land from Amman, Jordan.
target_text: Hall's landmark [visit|true] to Iraq started on Sunday evening when he [arrived|true] here by land from Amman, Jordan.

input_text: lu factuality: Dubai 10-28 (FP) - Dubai's Crown Prince Sheikh Mohamed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum inaugurated a free zone for e-commerce today, called Dubai Internet City.
target_text: Dubai 10-28 (FP) - Dubai's Crown Prince Sheikh Mohamed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum [inaugurated|true] a free zone for e-commerce today, called Dubai Internet City.

input_text: lu factuality: The preliminary stages of the project, the only one of its kind according to its designers, are estimated at $200 million.
target_text: The preliminary stages of the [project|true], the only one of its kind [according|true] to its designers, are [estimated|true] at $200 million.

input_text: lu factuality: Sheikh Mohamed, who is also the Defense Minister of the United Arab Emirates, announced at the inauguration ceremony that "we want to make Dubai a new trading center."
target_text: Sheikh Mohamed, who [is|true] also the Defense [Minister|true] of the United Arab Emirates, [announced|true] at the inauguration [ceremony|true] that "we [want|false] to [make|unknown] Dubai a new trading center."

input_text: lu factuality: The minister, who has his own website, also said: "I want Dubai to be the best place in the world for state-of-the-art technology companies."
target_text: The minister, who [has|true] his own [website|true], also [said|true]: "I [want|false] Dubai to [be|unknown] the best place in the world for state-of-the-art technology companies."

input_text: lu factuality: He said companies engaged in e-commerce would be able to set up offices, employ staff and own equipment in the open zone, including fully-owned foreign companies.
target_text: He [said|true] companies [engaged|false] in e-commerce [would|false] [be|unknown] able to [set|false] up offices, [employ|false] staff and [own|false] equipment in the open zone, [including|false] fully-owned foreign companies.

input_text: lu factuality: The e-commerce free zone is situated in north Dubai, near the industrial free zone in Jebel Ali, the top regional and tenth international leading area in container transit.
target_text: The e-commerce free zone is [situated|true] in north Dubai, near the industrial free zone in Jebel Ali, the top regional and tenth international leading area in container transit.

input_text: lu factuality: The inauguration of Dubai Internet City coincides with the opening of an annual IT show in Dubai, the Gulf Information Technology Exhibition (Gitex), the biggest in the Middle East.
